adbruki was a shaman leader and a hunter of the Uthgardt Black Raven tribe who inhabited the Ice Lakes and Cold Marshes area in the Northwest Faer√ªn in the early 14 century DR.
Hadbruki wielded a unique enchanted bludgeon called the Azure Rod.
In the , Hadbrukis tribe fell on hard times, forcing Uthgardts to consume their giant ravens. This turned the tribe aggressive to outsiders, especially to those who trespassed into the Black Ravens hunting grounds in the Cold Marshes. In Mirtul of 1312 DR, a group of mercenaries from the town of Targos ended up passing through the Fell Wood and across the tribes territory. Hadbruki confronted the adventurers and threatened them with violence. Hadbruki and his entire hunting party of barbarians attacked the mercenaries but lost their lives in the process.
